result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joseph Ardell Morro

records.addlTxt:
9:48 AM Defendant Joseph Ardell Morro in court.  Attorney Lance Morgan Nelsen in court for Joseph Ardell Morro.  Attorney Mark Adam Fruehauf in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Nelsen notes that defendant is looking to pursue in-patient treatment. Asks for another status at the beginning of November.
Status conference scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 09:00 am.

9:05 AM Defendant Joseph Ardell Morro in court.  Attorney Lance Morgan Nelsen in court for Joseph Ardell Morro.  Attorney Mark Adam Fruehauf in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Nelsen has received information, waives reading and pleads not guilty. Court accepts not guilty pleas. Attorney Nelsen asks for another status conference. State in agreement. Court set status conference.
Status conference scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 09:00 am.
State's Demand for Discovery and Inspection

records.addlTxt:
8:17 AM Defendant Joseph Ardell Morro in court.  Attorney Lance Morgan Nelsen in court for Joseph Ardell Morro.  Attorney Mark Adam Fruehauf in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney-Client waives preliminary hearing. Court finds waiver knowing/voluntary; finds probable cause that a felony was committed and binds over for arraignment. Court reminds of bail/conditions.
Arraignment scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Defendant's Demand for Discovery and Inspection
